remarks: Transfer an integral using ` S.2 ` to an equivalent integral using ` S. ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 6-Aug-2014.)
statement:
itgitg2.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> A e. RR ) $.
itgitg2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. RR ) -> 0 <_ A ) $.
itgitg2.3 $e |- ( ph -> ( x e. RR |-> A ) e. L^1 ) $.
itgitg2 $p |- ( ph -> S. RR A _d x = ( S.2 ` ( x e. RR |-> A ) ) ) $.
$d ph x $.
